explains: n. 记事本，便条本；笔记本（计算机），膝上型计算机

sentences.en: Asked what's on his iPad, Flake e-mailed: "I have a 'notepad' app that I checked the other day."
sentences.cn: 当问到他的 iPad 中有什么时，Flake 在电子邮件中说：“我日前装了一款'记事本'的应用程序。”

sentences.en: As the words begin to flow, the ideas will come from the shadows and let themselves be captured on your notepad or your screen.
sentences.cn: 当文字开始流动时，想法就会从阴影中浮现出来，被记录在你的记事本或屏幕上。

sentences.en: Open the file in a Notepad window.
sentences.cn: 在记事本窗口中打开该文件。
